alert.note: Alert for Custer; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Frontier, eastern Perkins, Lincoln, southeastern Logan, southwestern Custer and northeastern Hayes Counties through 215 AM CDT/115 AM MDT/... At 130 AM CDT/1230 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arnold to near Lake Maloney State Recreation Area to near Elsie. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...North Platte Airport measured wind gusts near 50 mph. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Curtis, Arnold, Callaway, Brady, Wallace, Maxwell, Wellfleet, Moorefield, Gandy, Dickens, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Keith, Maywood, Logan, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area, Tarboz Lake and Finchville. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 233 and 257. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 168 and 207. Highway 83 between mile markers 44 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins
